text: The BSS 01 (short for Bildschirmspiel 01, German for screen game 01https://www.old-computers.com/museum/computer.asp?st=1&c;=944&st;=1&c;=944 or video screen game 01) is a home video game console. It was released in 1980 or 1981 only in East Germany. The console is also known as TV-Spiel or RFT TV- Spiel. RFT stands for Rundfunk- und Fernmelde-Technik. This is an East German association of companies. == Games == Four games are pre-installed on the console: * Tennis (Pong clone) * Fu√üball (Association football) * Squash * Pelota The throw-in of the ball can be set to automatic or manual. After one player reaches 15 points, all games were over. == Successor == A successor of the BSS 01, named BSS 02, probably with color output, was planned, but discarded for the production of radio clocks. It is unknown if prototypes, sketches etc. of the BSS 02 exist. == References == == Other websites == Category:Video game consoles
